body:
In Kaldi, `kaldi-blas.h` can handle various BLAS packages' header including by defining macros like `HAVE_ATLAS`, `HAVE_OPENBLAS` etc. 

https://github.com/kaldi-asr/kaldi/blob/master/src/matrix/kaldi-blas.h

My question is, for packages depending on Kaldi (say https://github.com/Microsoft/CNTK ), where is the best practice to control the BLAS choice in accordance to Kaldi? And in Spack, how can we enhance this control?
title: How to control BLAS choice via preprocessor macros (HAVE_ATLAS, HAVE_OPENBLAS...)?
